addresses.isPhoneMandatory.title: Require a phone number with addresses
addresses.isPhoneMandatory.description: Check this box to make it mandatory to include a phone number when saving an address in My Account pages.

layout.colorPalette.title: Color Palettes
layout.colorPalette.description:
Color palettes maps a color defined in a netsuite list to a CSS color value. Then, one or more color can use a palette to show the values.
Use this table to modify default color palette or create new ones.
IMPORTANT:

paletteId.title: Palette id
paletteId.description: The palette id for this color

colorName.title: Color name
colorName.description: The color name as it is in the netsuite list used in the declaration.

colorValue.title: Color value
colorValue.description: The color CSS value - must be a valid CSS color.

imgheight.title: Image Height
imgheight.description: Heigh with its unit of the specified image.

imgwidth.title: Image Width
imgwidth.description: Width with its unit of the specified image.

layout.lightColors.title: Light colors
layout.lightColors.description: The light colors in the color palette

imageNotAvailable.title: Image Not Available url
imageNotAvailable.description: Enter the URL to the default image displayed when an item image is not configured.

imageSizeMapping.title: Image Resize
imageSizeMapping.description:
Here you can control the image-resize service values (website record). These are the current sizes used in SCA:
  • thumbnail: 175 * 175 - used in the search results
  • main: 600 * 600 - used as main image in the PDP
  • tinythumb: 50 * 50 - used as the tiny thumbs in the PDP's image gallery
  • zoom: 1200 * 1200 - used in the PDP's zommed image
  • fullscreen: 1600 * 1600
  • homeslider: 200 * 220
  • homecell: 125 * 125

id.title: size
id.description: The image size name used in the application

value.title: value
value.description: Corresponding value given in the website record configuration

bronto.adapterUrl.title: Adapter URL
bronto.adapterUrl.description: Enter the URL of the Bronto adapter.

group.title: Shopping Catalog
group.description: Commerce Catalog - search. pdp, facets, etc

addToCartBehavior.title: Add to cart behavior
addToCartBehavior.description: Choose the action that occurs when the user adds an item to the cart.

addToCartFromFacetsView.title: Add to Cart from Facets View
addToCartFromFacetsView.description: Check this box to display an Add to Cart button on each search result.

promocodes.allowMultiples.title: Allow adding more than one promocode
promocodes.allowMultiples.description: Check this box to enable stackable promotions on your SCA site.

matrixchilditems.enabled.title: Allow custom matrix child search in the item list
matrixchilditems.enabled.description: Check this box to enable the custom matrix child item search within the Item list.

matrixchilditems.fieldset.title: Matrix child items fieldset for search
matrixchilditems.fieldset.description: Enter the fieldset used on the matrix item child search.

showTaxDetailsPerLine.title: If the information is available to your country, shows detailed taxes in the cart (per line) and Purchase History
showTaxDetailsPerLine.description: If the information is available to your country, check this box to show the per-line tax details in the Cart and purchase history.

summaryTaxLabel.title: Tax-type label
summaryTaxLabel.description: Select the tax-type label to display in the Cart's Order Summary.

cases.defaultValues.statusStart.id.title: Status start id
cases.defaultValues.statusStart.id.description: Enter the NetSuite case status used to indicate that a case has been started.

cases.defaultValues.statusClose.id.title: Status close id
cases.defaultValues.statusClose.id.description: Enter the NetSuite case status used to indicate that a case has been closed.

cases.defaultValues.origin.id.title: Origin id
cases.defaultValues.origin.id.description: Enter the internal identifier of the case origin.

categories.menuLevel.title: Category navigation menu level deepness
categories.menuLevel.description: Enter the number of levels of the category hierarchy to show in the Categories navigation menu.

categories.addToNavigationTabs.title: Show Categories navigation menu
categories.addToNavigationTabs.description: Check this box to enable the Categories navigation menu.

categories.sideMenu.sortBy.title: Side menu > sort by
categories.sideMenu.sortBy.description: Enter the Category record field to act as the primary sort field in the Categories sidebar.

categories.sideMenu.additionalFields.title: Side menu > additional fields
categories.sideMenu.additionalFields.description: Multi-select any additional fields to be added to the default list returned by the ItemSearch API for use in the application for the side menu.

categories.sideMenu.uncollapsible.title: Side menu > collapsible
categories.sideMenu.uncollapsible.description: Check this box to make the Categories side menu collapsible and expandable.

categories.sideMenu.showMax.title: Side menu > showMax
categories.sideMenu.showMax.description: Enter the maximum number of categories to show in the list before displaying a Show More link.

categories.sideMenu.collapsed.title: Side menu > collapsed
categories.sideMenu.collapsed.description: Check this box to make the Categories side menu appear collased when the page is loaded.

categories.subCategories.sortBy.title: Sub categories > sort by
categories.subCategories.sortBy.description: Enter the Category record field to act as the primary sort field for sub categories.

categories.subCategories.fields.title: Sub categories > additional fields
categories.subCategories.fields.description: Multi-select any additional fields to be added to the default list returned by the ItemSearch API for use in the application for sub categories.

categories.category.fields.title: category fields
categories.category.fields.description: Multi-select any additional fields to be added to the default list of category fields. Category Fields are the fields that appear in the Category page.

categories.breadcrumb.fields.title: breadcrumb fields
categories.breadcrumb.fields.description: Multi-select any additional fields to be added to the default list returned by the ItemSearch API for use in the breadcrumb navigation.

categories.menu.sortBy.title: menu > sort by
categories.menu.sortBy.description: Enter the Category record field to act as the primary sort field in the Navigation menu.

categories.menu.fields.title: menu fields
categories.menu.fields.description: Multi-select any additional fields to be added to the default list returned by the ItemSearch API for use in the Navigation menu.

subtab.title: Forms
subtab.description: Checkout configuration related to web forms.

checkoutApp.skipLogin.title: Skip Checkout Login
checkoutApp.skipLogin.description: Check this box to enable anonymous users to skip the login/register page when they navigate to Checkout.

isMultiShippingEnabled.title: Enable Multiple Shipping
isMultiShippingEnabled.description: Check this box to let users specify multiple shipping addresses for an order.

removePaypalAddress.title: Remove Paypal Addresses
removePaypalAddress.description: Check this box to remove PayPal addresses from the NetSuite record after placing the order as they are not valid NetSuite records.

isThreeDSecureEnabled.title: Enable 3D Secure payments
isThreeDSecureEnabled.description: Check this box to enable 3D Secure payments for your site.

checkoutApp.checkoutSteps.title: Checkout Steps
checkoutApp.checkoutSteps.description: Choose an option to specify the checkout steps configuration of the Checkout application.

checkoutApp.paypalLogo.title: PayPal logo url
checkoutApp.paypalLogo.description: Enter the URL of the PayPal logo. SuiteCommerce Advanced displays this logo in the check out process.

checkoutApp.invoiceTermsAndConditions.title: Invoice Terms and Conditions
checkoutApp.invoiceTermsAndConditions.description: Enter the text of the invoice terms and conditions in HTML format.
checkoutApp.invoiceTermsAndConditions.default:
Invoice Terms and Conditions

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

autoPopulateNameAndEmail.title: Auto populate name and email
autoPopulateNameAndEmail.description: Check this box to enable auto-population of a guest shopperâ€™s name and email in any forms during checkout. If this box is unchecked, no fields will populate automatically.

forms.loginAsGuest.showName.title: Login as guest, show name
forms.loginAsGuest.showName.description: Check this box to show first and last name input fields when a user registers as a guest. If Auto Populate Name and Email is enabled, these names will be required and automatically populate throughout the checkout process where applicable. If unchecked, no fields populate automatically.

forms.loginAsGuest.showEmail.title: Login as guest, show email
forms.loginAsGuest.showEmail.description: Check this box to show email address input fields when a user registers as a guest. If Auto Populate Name and Email is enabled, this address will be required and automatically populate throughout the checkout process where applicable. If unchecked, no fields populate automatically.

forms.address.showAddressLineTwo.title: Show address line 2
forms.address.showAddressLineTwo.description: Check this box to display a secondary address line during checkout.

subtab.title: Site Management Tools
subtab.description: CMS - Content Management System by CXM

cms.useCMS.title: Use Site Management Tools
cms.useCMS.description: Check this box to enable Site Management Tools integration in SuiteCommerce Advanced.

cms.escToLoginDisabled.title: Disable ESC key to login
cms.escToLoginDisabled.description: Check this box to disable the Escape to Login to CMS feature. Instead, access the CMS Administrator using http://my.webstore/cms/2/admin/cms.jsp.

cms.baseUrl.title: Landing Pages URL
cms.baseUrl.description: Specify the base URL, consisting of the protocol + hostname, for accessing landing pages. For example, enter https://system.sandbox.netsuite.com when working in a sandbox account. Leave the field blank to access landing pages on the production account.

cms.adapterVersion.title: CMS Adapter Version
cms.adapterVersion.description: Select the CMS Adapter version to be used by the domain.

defaultSearchUrl.title: Default search url
defaultSearchUrl.description: Enter the the default search URL.

searchApiMasterOptions.title: Search API Fieldsets
searchApiMasterOptions.description: Options to be passed when querying the Items Search API

defaultPaginationSettings.showPageList.title: Desktop > Show page list
defaultPaginationSettings.showPageList.description: Check this box to display  the Page List on desktop browsers.

defaultPaginationSettings.pagesToShow.title: Desktop > Pages to show
defaultPaginationSettings.pagesToShow.description: Enter the maximum number of pages to display in the page list on desktop browsers.

defaultPaginationSettings.showPageIndica.title: Desktop > Show page indicator
defaultPaginationSettings.showPageIndica.description: Check this box to display a current page indicator in the page list on desktop browsers.

defaultPaginationSettingsPhone.showPageL.title: Phone > Show page list
defaultPaginationSettingsPhone.showPageL.description: Check this box to display  the Page List on phone browsers.

defaultPaginationSettingsPhone.pagesToSh.title: Phone > Pages to show
defaultPaginationSettingsPhone.pagesToSh.description: Enter the maximum number of pages to display in the page list on phone browsers.

defaultPaginationSettingsPhone.showPageI.title: Phone > Show page indicator
defaultPaginationSettingsPhone.showPageI.description: Check this box to display a current page indicator in the page list on phone browsers.

defaultPaginationSettingsTablet.showPage.title: Tablet > Show page list
defaultPaginationSettingsTablet.showPage.description: Check this box to display  the Page List on tablet browsers.

defaultPaginationSettingsTablet.pagesToS.title: Tablet > Pages to show
defaultPaginationSettingsTablet.pagesToS.description: Enter the maximum number of pages to display in the page list on tablet browsers.

defaultPaginationSettingsTablet.showPage.title: Tablet > Show page indicator
defaultPaginationSettingsTablet.showPage.description: Check this box to display a current page indicator in the page list on tablet browsers.

subtab.title: Payment Methods
subtab.description: Payment methods related settings like Credit Card configuration, payment method regex, etc

paymentmethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentmethods.description: Map of payment methods, please update the keys using your account setup information.

key.title: key
key.description: This number should match the property 'key' of the objects returned by the following JavaScript call (run it in the Browser Console): 'SC.ENVIRONMENT.siteSettings.paymentmethods' . You can edit/add new payment methods going to Setup-> Accounting -> Accounting Lists - filter by 'Payment Method'.

regex.title: regex
regex.description: The regex to match the payment method number

description.title: description
description.description: Some words about the payment method for documentation purposes only

default.description: This company allows both private individuals and businesses to accept payments over the Internet

subtab.title: Credit Card
subtab.description: Payment methods related settings like Credit Card configuration, payment method regex, etc

creditCard.showCreditCardHelp.title: Show Credit Card help
creditCard.showCreditCardHelp.description: Check this box to enable help text for finding a credit card security code.

creditCard.creditCardHelpTitle.title: Credit Card help title
creditCard.creditCardHelpTitle.description: The text to show as the title of the help
creditCard.creditCardHelpTitle.default: Enter the title of the credit card help link. This title is displayed only if the Show Credit Card Help property is enabled.

creditCard.imageCvvAllCards.title: CVV All cards image
creditCard.imageCvvAllCards.description: Enter the URL of the image showing the card verification value (CVV) number on credit cards. This image displays a number located on the back of the credit card.

creditCard.imageCvvAmericanCard.title: CVV American card image
creditCard.imageCvvAmericanCard.description: Enter the URL for the image showing the card verification value (CVV) number on American credit cards. This image shows a number located on the front of the credit card.

creditCard.creditCardShowSecureInfo.title: Credit Card secure info
creditCard.creditCardShowSecureInfo.description: Enter security-related text to be displayed in the user interface.
creditCard.creditCardShowSecureInfo.default: We take all reasonable steps to protect our customers personal information against loss, misuse and alteration. We use encryption technology whenever receiving and transferring your personal information on our site. When you are viewing a page that is requesting personal information, the URL in the address bar at top of your browser will start with "https". This indicates your transaction session is secured through Secure Sockets Layer (SSL). If the web page you are viewing does not start with "https", please contact us.

tracking.googleAdWordsConversion.id.title: Google AdWords ID
tracking.googleAdWordsConversion.id.description: Enter your Google AdWords ID. This value corresponds to the conversion tag you created in your Google AdWords account.

tracking.googleAdWordsConversion.value.title: AdWords value
tracking.googleAdWordsConversion.value.description: Enter the value you defined in the conversion tag you created in your Google AdWords account.

tracking.googleAdWordsConversion.label.title: Google AdWords label
tracking.googleAdWordsConversion.label.description: Enter your Google AdWords label. This value corresponds to the conversion tag you created in your Google AdWords account.

tracking.GoogleAnalyticsFour.propertyID.title: Google Analytics 4 tracking ID
tracking.GoogleAnalyticsFour.propertyID.description: Enter the Google Analytics 4 Tracking ID. SuiteCommerce Advanced inserts this property into each page of the application. To locate the tracking ID, login to your Google Analytics account and go to Admin > Property > Property Settings.

tracking.GoogleAnalyticsFour.domainName.title: Google Analytics 4 domain
tracking.GoogleAnalyticsFour.domainName.description: Enter the domain used for Google Universal Analytics. The value you enter depends on which application you want to use Google Universal Analytics

tracking.GoogleAnalyticsFour.domainNameS.title: Google Analytics 4 secure domain
tracking.GoogleAnalyticsFour.domainNameS.description: Enter the secure domain used for Google Universal Analytics. Possible values are the same as the Universal Analytics Domain property.

tracking.googleUniversalAnalytics.proper.title: Google Universal Analytics ID
tracking.googleUniversalAnalytics.proper.description: Enter the Google Universal Analytics Tracking ID. SuiteCommerce Advanced inserts this property into each page of the application. To locate the tracking ID, login to your Google Analytics account and go to Admin > Property > Property Settings.

tracking.googleUniversalAnalytics.domain.title: Google Universal Analytics domain
tracking.googleUniversalAnalytics.domain.description: Enter the domain used for Google Universal Analytics. The value you enter depends on which application you want to use Google Universal Analytics

tracking.googleUniversalAnalytics.domain.title: Google Universal Analytics secure domain
tracking.googleUniversalAnalytics.domain.description: Enter the secure domain used for Google Universal Analytics. Possible values are the same as the Universal Analytics Domain property.

subtab.title: Item Options
subtab.description: General configuration for all item options across the application

ItemOptions.showOnlyTheListedOptions.title: Show only items listed in: Item options and custom transaction column fields
ItemOptions.showOnlyTheListedOptions.description: Check this box to show only the fields listed in: "Item Options and Custom Transaction Column Fields" on your webstore.

ItemOptions.optionsConfiguration.title: Item options and custom transaction column fields
ItemOptions.optionsConfiguration.description:
Settings for displaying each of the item options in the Detailed Page. Each of the item options are objects that extend whats comming of the api. This options should have (but not limited to) these documented properties. We have provided some templates for you to use but you are encouraged to create your own:
For the selector we have created: item_views_option_color_tpl, item_views_option_text_tpl, item_views_option_tile_tpl, and for the selected we have created: item_views_selected_option_tpl, item_views_selected_option_color_tpl

cartOptionId.title: Cart Option Id
cartOptionId.description: The id of an option in the cart (!required, is the primary key for the mapping)

colors.title: Color Palette
colors.description: Use the Facets color palette for this

label.title: Label
label.description: The label that the option will be shown

urlParameterName.title: URL Parameter Name
urlParameterName.description: The key of the option when its stored in the url

useLabelsOnUrl.title: Use Labels on URL
useLabelsOnUrl.description: Indicate if this option should show the label's value when displayed in the URL or instead the internalid's value should be used (the second is the default)

index.title: Sort Index
index.description: Position in which the current option should be shown (default value 10)

templateSelector.title: Selector Template
templateSelector.description: the template that will be rendered for selecting the options (Item list and PDP)

showSelectorInList.title: Show option in item lists
showSelectorInList.description: true if this option will be show in the facet results

templateFacetCell.title: Facet Cell Template
templateFacetCell.description: the template that will be used to render options on facets

templateSelected.title: Selected Template
templateSelected.description: the template that will be rendered for the item in the cart (Cart and Cart confirmation)

listHeader.filterRangeQuantityDays.title: Filter range quantity days
listHeader.filterRangeQuantityDays.description: Enter the number of days within the date range used when displaying data.

subtab.title: Overview
subtab.description: Overview is the main view of My Account experience that shows the customer's credit cards, addresses, etc

overview.customerSupportURL.title: Customer Support URL
overview.customerSupportURL.description: Enter the URL for your customer support page.

overview.homeBanners.title: Home Banners
overview.homeBanners.description: If you configure here it will display it in the index of my account. Ideal for promotions for clients

overview.homeRecentOrdersQuantity.title: Recent Orders quantity to show
overview.homeRecentOrdersQuantity.description: Enter the quantity of recent orders displayed in the My Account Overview page.

productline.multiImageOption.title: Multi-Image Option
productline.multiImageOption.description: Configure what are the item option fields that filter images

ItemOptions.defaultTemplates.selectorByT.title: Default Selector templates by item option Type
ItemOptions.defaultTemplates.selectorByT.description: Default Templates to select an item option

type.title: Option Type
type.description: The type of the option or the string default

ItemOptions.defaultTemplates.facetCellBy.title: Default Facet Cell templates by item option Type
ItemOptions.defaultTemplates.facetCellBy.description: Default Templates to show item option on facets result pages

type.title: Option Type
type.description: The type of the option or the string default

templateSelector.title: Selector Template
templateSelector.description: the template that will be rendered for selecting the options (Item list and PDP)

showSelectorInList.title: Show option in item lists
showSelectorInList.description: true if this option will be show in the facet results

templateFacetCell.title: Facet Cell Template
templateFacetCell.description: the template that will be used to render options on facets

quote.daysToExpire.title: Days to Expiration
quote.daysToExpire.description: Enter the number of days you want all quotes to remain valid after initial submittal. All quotes use the same configurable expiration, in days. After this time expires, the quote can no longer become a purchase.

quote.disclaimerSummary.title: Disclaimer summary
quote.disclaimerSummary.description: Enter the sales representative disclaimer summary that appears under the Order Summary area of the Quote Details page. This message appears if no sales representative is assigned to the quote.
quote.disclaimerSummary.default: To place the order please contact Contact Center at (000)-XXX-XXXX or send an email to xxxx@xxxx.com

quote.disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
quote.disclaimer.description: Enter the sales representative information disclaimer that appears at the bottom of the Quote Details page. This message appears if no sales representative is assigned to the quote.
quote.disclaimer.default: For immediate assistance contact Contact Center at (000)-XXX-XXXX or send an email to xxxx@xxxx.com

quote.defaultPhone.title: Default phone for Sales Rep
quote.defaultPhone.description: Enter the default sales representative phone number. This phone number appears on the Quote Details page if a sales associate is assigned to the quote, but the phone number has not been assigned.

quote.defaultEmail.title: Default email for Sales Rep
quote.defaultEmail.description: Enter the default sales representative Email address. This email address appears on the Quote Details page if a sales associate is assigned to the quote, but the email address has not been assigned.

recentlyViewedItems.useCookie.title: Use cookies for Recently Viewed Items
recentlyViewedItems.useCookie.description: Check this box to track recently viewed items with a browser cookie.

recentlyViewedItems.numberOfItemsDisplay.title: Number of displayed items
recentlyViewedItems.numberOfItemsDisplay.description: Enter the number of recently viewed items to display in the browser.

returnAuthorization.cancelUrlRoot.title: Cancel URL root
returnAuthorization.cancelUrlRoot.description: Enter a custom domain used to override the domain used to cancel a return authorization.

default.text: Quality did not meet my standards
Not as pictured on the Website

isSCISIntegrationEnabled.title: Is SCIS integration enabled
isSCISIntegrationEnabled.description: Check this box to enable SCIS integration with your SuiceCommerce Advanced site.

locationTypeMapping.store.internalid.title: Location type mapping store internal id
locationTypeMapping.store.internalid.description: Enter the location-type identifier that SuiteCommerce Advanced uses to associate a transaction with an in-store purchase. 1 = store, 2 = online

locationTypeMapping.store.name.title: Location type mapping store name
locationTypeMapping.store.name.description: Enter a descriptive text associated with the locationTypeMapping.store.internalid property.

addThis.enable.title: Enable
addThis.enable.description: Check this box to enable the AddThis sharing service.

addThis.pubId.title: Public Id
addThis.pubId.description: Enter your AddThis Profile ID here.

addThis.toolboxClass.title: Toolbox class
addThis.toolboxClass.description: This string specifies the class to be added to the AddThis Toolbox.

facebook.enable.title: Enable
facebook.enable.description: Check this box to enable the Facebook addThis sharing service.

facebook.appId.title: Application id
facebook.appId.description: Enter your custom application ID to associate the domain to your application ID.

facebook.popupOptions.status.title: Facebook popup status
facebook.popupOptions.status.description: Select yes to enable the Facebook popup. Select no to disable it.

facebook.popupOptions.resizable.title: Facebook popup resizable
facebook.popupOptions.resizable.description: Select yes to make the popup resizable. Select no to restrict resizing.

facebook.popupOptions.personalbar.title: Facebook popup personalbar
facebook.popupOptions.personalbar.description: Select yes to show a personal bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.directories.title: Facebook popup directories
facebook.popupOptions.directories.description: Select yes to show a directories bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.location.title: Facebook popup location
facebook.popupOptions.location.description: Select yes to show a location bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.toolbar.title: Facebook popup toolbar
facebook.popupOptions.toolbar.description: Select yes to show a tool bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.menubar.title: Facebook popup menubar
facebook.popupOptions.menubar.description: Select yes to show a menu bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.width.title: Facebook popup width
facebook.popupOptions.width.description: Enter the width (in pixels) of the Facebook popup.

facebook.popupOptions.height.title: Facebook popup height
facebook.popupOptions.height.description: Enter the height (in pixels) of the Facebook popup.

facebook.popupOptions.left.title: Facebook popup left
facebook.popupOptions.left.description: Enter the left offset (in pixels) of the Facebook popup.

facebook.popupOptions.top.title: Facebook popup top
facebook.popupOptions.top.description: Enter the top offset (in pixels) of the Facebook popup.

twitter.popupOptions.location.description: Select yes to show a location bar on the Twitter popup menu. Select no to hide it.

twitter.popupOptions.toolbar.title: Twitter popup toolbar
twitter.popupOptions.toolbar.description: Select yes to show a tool bar on the Twitter popup menu. Select no to hide it.

twitter.popupOptions.menubar.title: Twitter popup menubar
twitter.popupOptions.menubar.description: Select yes to show a menu bar on the Twitter popup menu. Select no to hide it.

twitter.popupOptions.width.title: Twitter popup width
twitter.popupOptions.width.description: Enter the width (in pixels) of the Twitter popup.

twitter.popupOptions.height.title: Twitter popup height
twitter.popupOptions.height.description: Enter the height (in pixels) of the Twitter popup.

twitter.popupOptions.left.title: Twitter popup left
twitter.popupOptions.left.description: Enter the left offset (in pixels) of the Twitter popup.

twitter.popupOptions.top.title: Twitter popup top
twitter.popupOptions.top.description: Enter the top offset (in pixels) of the Twitter popup.

twitter.via.title: Twitter via
twitter.via.description: This specifies the Twitter account of the original tweeter. For example: @MerchantName.

faviconPath.title: Favicon of the Website
faviconPath.description: Add the path to the site's favicon.

subtab.title: Filter Site
subtab.description: Filter by site on Record Lists. 'all': all the sites in the account. 'current': just records under current site. 'siteIds': Array of site ids to be specified in the 'filterSiteIds' property. Current site and not related to any site records will be also considered.

filterSite.option.title: Filter Site Option
filterSite.option.description: Choose how record lists are filtered.

group.title: Multi-Domain
group.description: Multiple domains configuration. Enable it if you need to publish the same store in different languages or currencies, ugins different domains.

multiDomain.hosts.languages.title: List of languages
multiDomain.hosts.languages.description: Use the following list to add your hosts by id. In given example, not enabled by default, two different hosts has been configured one for English and dollars alone, and the other with two currencies and two languages. Important, each language must have its own domain.

host.title: Host id
host.description: The host id we are talking about in this list line

title.title: Language Title
title.description: The host language's title if non set it will use default naming or locale

multiDomain.hosts.currencies.title: List of currencies
multiDomain.hosts.currencies.description: Use the following list to add your hosts by id. In given example, not enabled by default, two different hosts has been configured one for English and dollars alone, and the other with two currencies and two languages. Important, each language must have its own domain.

host.title: Host id
host.description: The host id we are talking about in this list line

title.title: Title
title.description: The host language's title if non set it will use default naming or locale

orderShoppingFieldKeys.keys.title: Shopping's Order
orderShoppingFieldKeys.keys.description: These are the fields of Shopping's order record, a.k.a the Cart

orderShoppingFieldKeys.items.title: Shopping's Order Items
orderShoppingFieldKeys.items.description: These are the fields for each item of Shopping's order record, a.k.a the Cart

orderCheckoutFieldKeys.keys.title: Checkout's Order
orderCheckoutFieldKeys.keys.description: These are the fields for Checkout's order record

orderCheckoutFieldKeys.items.title: Checkout's Order Items
orderCheckoutFieldKeys.items.description: These are the fields for each item of Checkout's order record

suitescriptResultsPerPage.title: nlapiSearchRecord Results Per Page
suitescriptResultsPerPage.description: This integer specifies the default number of search results displayed per page. Any SuiteCommerce Advanced feature that displays search results uses this value by default.

fieldKeys.itemsFieldsAdvancedName.title: Items Fields Advanced Name
fieldKeys.itemsFieldsAdvancedName.description: This name sets the Field Set to be used when using the Item Search API to return item details.

fieldKeys.itemsFieldsStandardKeys.title: Item Fields Standard
fieldKeys.itemsFieldsStandardKeys.description: These are the fields for items in the order of SiteBuilder

extraTranslations.title: List of translations
extraTranslations.description: You can add new translations strings here or override existing ones.

group.title: Tracking Services
group.description: Configure tracking services like Analytics and Tag Manager

ItemOptions.defaultTemplates.selectedByT.title: Default Selected templates by item option Type
ItemOptions.defaultTemplates.selectedByT.description: Default Templates to show a selected item option

type.title: Option Type
type.description: The type of the option or the string default

templateSelected.title: Selected Template
templateSelected.description: the template that will be rendered for the item in the cart (Cart and Cart confirmation)
